SettingsPage_OptimizePreviews_Descriptio: Optimize mod preview images for better performance
ImageOptimizer_ThreadCount_Description: More threads = faster processing ({0} logical cores detected)
ImageOptimizer_CreateBackups_Description: Creates a ZIP archive with original files (preview_backup_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.zip)
ImageOptimizer_KeepOriginals_Description: Original files will not be deleted (e.g., preview.png remains alongside preview.jpg)
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Full_Description: Resize to 1000x1000, crop to square, convert to JPEG, generate miniatures. Respects backup and keep originals settings.
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Lite_Description: Convert to JPEG with compression, generate miniatures, no resizing or cropping. Respects backup and keep originals settings.
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Rename_Description: Rename files to standard names (preview.jpg, preview-01.jpg, etc.) and generate thumbnails (minitile.jpg, catprev.jpg, catmini.jpg)
ImageOptimizer_Mode_RenameOnly_Descripti: Only rename files to standard names (preview.jpg, preview-01.jpg, etc.) without optimization or thumbnail generation
